members.description: Opens the UIComponent object specified by the popUp property.
Closes the UIComponent object opened by the PopUpButton control.

If true, specifies to pop up the popUp when you click the main button. The popUp always appears when you press the Spacebar, or when you click the pop-up button, regardless of the setting of the openAlways property.
Specifies the UIComponent object, or object defined by a subclass of UIComponent, to pop up. For example, you can specify a Menu, TileList, or Tree control.
